title: I'm tilted this is ridiculous

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Can someone please tell me why I didn't get an S haha I carried this game so hard and played it almost perfectly
Farm could have been higher but I mean I spent half the game roaming
Struggles of getting S tokens on ADCs

replies.body: Gold is my opinion, nearing 40 minutes as an ADC should be around 20-21k far greater if you're as fed as you were. seeing as how you have 217 cs at 37 minutes the game probably doesn't feel you utilized your time in a S or S+ worthy manner. S - S+ is easiest on an ADC cause you essentially spend the entire match doing something. Jungle is a real RIP you have to end the game @ like 20 for the best chance of getting an S+ token. Not sure how many Towers & Epic monsters you contributed too aswell they have an impact. I've gone 5/5/5 (just an example) but a flat even score but taken 4 dragons and 7 towers and achieved S.
When you reach full build farming should no longer matter - obviously there are exceptions, but generally speaking the appropriate metric should be gold over time not minions over time.

same with jungle, it doesn't matter if i spend the entire game choking the life out of the enemy jungler and tilt the ever living shit out of the laners, if i dont have 200 farm at 20 mins i get nothing, its almost like rito are telling you control jungling  isn't good
Literally every time a post like this comes up the answer is always farm. Your farm rate this game was 45%, your missing over half the minions per wave, that isn't S worthy
